room_title: Escape room "Big Top Carnival" by Lock'd Escape Adventures in Putnam
review: We had a group of 8 in the Big Top room and had a lot of fun. We definitely plan on going back. The staff is really friendly. And they design the rooms, challenges and clues themselves. Pretty awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Big Top Carnival" by Lock'd Escape Adventures in Putnam
review: We had a great time. We went into the Big Top room, didn't make it out, but had fun trying. We'll be back to try another room. Clues were well done. Thanks.

room_title: Escape room "Big Top Carnival" by Lock'd Escape Adventures in Putnam
review: Myself and my two daughters did the Big Top Carnival room and really had a lot of fun! The clues were very clever and, even though we did not manage to escape, we were pretty happy with how far we were able to get (since there were only 3 of us). Already planning to go back and try another room with a bigger group!

room_title: Escape room "Big Top Carnival" by Lock'd Escape Adventures in Putnam
review: Had a blast in the carnival room. 9 first timers didn't get out but we were so close! Would go again! Don't let the appearance of the place worry you... it's a good time.

room_title: Escape room "Big Top Carnival" by Lock'd Escape Adventures in Putnam
review: Awesome time!!!!!! The staff is great and made sure we knew what we needed to do and that we had a fun time. We can't wait to go back. Escape games are the next big thing!
